DOC.brief_summary: This study examine effect oral dronabinol tetrahydrocannabinol ( THC ) withdrawal symptom marijuana dependent volunteer , evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , cardiovascular effect combination oral dronabinol smoke marijuana determine potential significant drug interaction conduct outpatient study .
DOC.criteria: Must 18 45 year age Must good general health meet DSMIV diagnostic criterion marijuana dependence Must seek treatment time study entry Must able understand provide write informed consent Must provide 1 marijuana positive urine specimen ( > 50 ng/mL ) within 28day screening period If female child bear potential , agree use birth control . Exclusion Criteria : Please contact site information
